docs.title: 2024 International Workshop on Frontiers of Chemical Physics
docs.text: Welcome to 2024 International Workshop on Frontiers of Chemical Physics! Our workshop will take place Aug 25—26, 2024, in University of Science and Technology of China (USTC), Hefei, Anhui, China. The workshop aims to foster the exchange of cutting-edge research in various fields of chemical physics, encompassing both experimental and theoretical advancements.

docs.title: Agenda
docs.text:
• Aug 24, 2024: Arrival, Registration

  • Aug 25, 2024: Presentations, Banquet

  • Aug 26, 2024: Presentations, Departure

docs.title: Conference venue
docs.text: • Lecture Hall, 3rd Floor, Teaching and Research Building of Material Science, USTC, No. 96 Jinzhai Road, Hefei

docs.title: Accommodation (tentative)
docs.text: • Gaosu New Century (Gao Su Kai Yuan) International Hotel, No. 88 Hezuohua South Road, Hefei

docs.title: AIRPORT or RAILWAY STATION PICKUP
docs.text: Picking up from the Hefei airport or railway station is available if necessary traveling information was sent to the organizers on time.
